description:
The law firm of Abels & Annes, P.C., in Chicago, Illinois, focuses exclusively on personal injury law. Serving clients in Chicago and throughout Cook County and the surrounding areas, we handle all types of personal injury claims and civil litigation cases. From motor vehicle and work-related accidents to medical malpractice and nursing home abuse and most other type of tortious claims.

Since we represent only plaintiff accident victims, we are able to deliver the highest level of service to our clients. Throughout our history, we have helped so many clients recover the compensation and benefits they need to support themselves and their families, securing millions of dollars in settlements and awards.

When working with our law firm, you will receive the dedicated attention of a highly experienced attorney who truly has your best interests at heart. Compassionate and respectful of your situation, we will work closely with you in order to achieve the results you expect and deserve.

If you were injured or lost a loved one due to the negligent, careless or reckless acts of others, you owe it to yourself to see why so many in the Chicago area turn to Abels & Annes, P.C. for help. Our law firm offers free initial consultations with no risk and no obligation. Se habla Español.
